attributes.action: The Government must change its policy on working with the EU concerning Covid-19
attributes.additional_details:
That the Government is not working with the EU to limit the effects of Covid-19 is a life-threateningly dangerous dereliction of duty.

Despite the UK Government having decided to leave the EU, the European Union has on several occasions offered it's help which the government continues to reject.

Engaging 'British' companies to produce equipment such as ventilators now, is wasting time and endangering lives of both patients and staff of emergency services.

For example: 

https://bit.ly/2wGJfEi
attributes.background: In order to mitigate the effects of Covid-19, the Government needs to put aside its differences and work together with the EU as if it were still an active member in order to save lives and curb the spread of a disease which has the capability of taking millions of lives.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305825

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
